response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. Given its worth to us, we believe it would be a great addition to your collection or business. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a significant saving compared to our standard pricing, while still allowing us to cover our costs and ensure the continued availability of this exceptional item. We hope this proposal meets your expectations and looks forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 14000}
